problem_names:
lemma gen_lower_bound_increasing:
  fixes a :: real
  assumes "a \<le> x"
      and "\<And>y. a \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. fl x - f x) has_real_derivative g y) (at y)"
      and "\<And>y. a \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> g y \<le> 0"
      and "fl a = f a"
    shows "fl x \<le> f x"

lemma gen_lower_bound_decreasing:
  fixes a :: real
  assumes "x \<le> a"
      and "\<And>y. x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> a \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. fl x - f x) has_real_derivative g y) (at y)"
      and "\<And>y. x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> a \<Longrightarrow> g y \<ge> 0"
      and "fl a = f a"
    shows "fl x \<le> f x"

lemma gen_upper_bound_increasing:
  fixes a :: real
  assumes "a \<le> x"
      and "\<And>y. a \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. fu x - f x) has_real_derivative g y) (at y)"
      and "\<And>y. a \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> g y \<ge> 0"
      and "fu a = f a"
    shows "f x \<le> fu x"

lemma gen_upper_bound_decreasing:
  fixes a :: real
  assumes "x \<le> a"
      and "\<And>y. x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> a \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. fu x - f x) has_real_derivative g y) (at y)"
      and "\<And>y. x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> a \<Longrightarrow> g y \<le> 0"
      and "fu a = f a"
    shows "f x \<le> fu x"
translations:
lemma gen_lower_bound_increasing:
  fixes a :: real
  assumes "a \<le> x"
      and "\<And>y. a \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. fl x - f x) has_real_derivative g y) (at y)"
      and "\<And>y. a \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> g y \<le> 0"
      and "fl a = f a"
    shows "fl x \<le> f x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl x \<le> f x
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl x \<le> f x
have "fl x - f x \<le> fl a - f a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl x - f x \<le> fl a - f a
apply (rule DERIV_nonpos_imp_nonincreasing [where f = "\<lambda>x. fl x - f x"])

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. a \<le> x
 2. \<And>xa.
       \<lbrakk>a \<le> xa; xa \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y.
                            ((\<lambda>x. fl x - f x) has_real_derivative y)
                             (at xa) \<and>
                            y \<le> 0
apply (rule assms)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa.
       \<lbrakk>a \<le> xa; xa \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>y.
                            ((\<lambda>x. fl x - f x) has_real_derivative y)
                             (at xa) \<and>
                            y \<le> 0
apply (intro allI impI exI conjI)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>xa.
       \<lbrakk>a \<le> xa; xa \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. fl x - f x) has_real_derivative
                          ?y3 xa)
                          (at xa)
 2. \<And>xa.
       \<lbrakk>a \<le> xa; xa \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ?y3 xa \<le> 0
apply (rule assms | simp)+

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

proof (state)
this:
  fl x - f x \<le> fl a - f a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl x \<le> f x
also

proof (state)
this:
  fl x - f x \<le> fl a - f a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl x \<le> f x

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl a - f a = 0
by (simp add: assms)

proof (state)
this:
  fl a - f a = 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl x \<le> f x
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  fl x - f x \<le> 0
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  fl x - f x \<le> 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl x \<le> f x
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  fl x \<le> f x

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma gen_lower_bound_decreasing:
  fixes a :: real
  assumes "x \<le> a"
      and "\<And>y. x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> a \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. fl x - f x) has_real_derivative g y) (at y)"
      and "\<And>y. x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> a \<Longrightarrow> g y \<ge> 0"
      and "fl a = f a"
    shows "fl x \<le> f x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl x \<le> f x
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl x \<le> f x

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl (- (- x)) \<le> f (- (- x))
apply (rule gen_lower_bound_increasing [of "-a" "-x" _ _ "\<lambda>u. - g (-u)"])

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. - a \<le> - x
 2. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>- a \<le> y; y \<le> - x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x.
                              fl (- x) - f (- x)) has_real_derivative
                          - g (- y))
                          (at y)
 3. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>- a \<le> y; y \<le> - x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> - g (- y) \<le> 0
 4. fl (- (- a)) = f (- (- a))
apply (auto simp: assms)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>- a \<le> y; y \<le> - x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x.
                              fl (- x) - f (- x)) has_real_derivative
                          - g (- y))
                          (at y)
apply (subst DERIV_mirror [symmetric])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>- a \<le> y; y \<le> - x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>a. fl a - f a) has_real_derivative
                          g (- y))
                          (at (- y))
apply (simp add: assms)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

proof (state)
this:
  fl (- (- x)) \<le> f (- (- x))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl x \<le> f x
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  fl (- (- x)) \<le> f (- (- x))
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  fl (- (- x)) \<le> f (- (- x))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fl x \<le> f x
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  fl x \<le> f x

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma gen_upper_bound_increasing:
  fixes a :: real
  assumes "a \<le> x"
      and "\<And>y. a \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. fu x - f x) has_real_derivative g y) (at y)"
      and "\<And>y. a \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> x \<Longrightarrow> g y \<ge> 0"
      and "fu a = f a"
    shows "f x \<le> fu x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f x \<le> fu x
apply (rule gen_lower_bound_increasing [of a x f fu  "\<lambda>u. - g u"])

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. a \<le> x
 2. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>a \<le> y; y \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. f x - fu x) has_real_derivative
                          - g y)
                          (at y)
 3. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>a \<le> y; y \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> - g y \<le> 0
 4. f a = fu a
using assms DERIV_minus [where f = "\<lambda>x. fu x - f x"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<le> x
  \<lbrakk>a \<le> ?y; ?y \<le> x\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. fu x - f x) has_real_derivative g ?y)
                     (at ?y)
  \<lbrakk>a \<le> ?y; ?y \<le> x\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> 0 \<le> g ?y
  fu a = f a
  ((\<lambda>x. fu x - f x) has_real_derivative ?D)
   (at ?x within ?s) \<Longrightarrow>
  ((\<lambda>x. - (fu x - f x)) has_real_derivative - ?D) (at ?x within ?s)

goal (4 subgoals):
 1. a \<le> x
 2. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>a \<le> y; y \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. f x - fu x) has_real_derivative
                          - g y)
                          (at y)
 3. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>a \<le> y; y \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> - g y \<le> 0
 4. f a = fu a
apply auto

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

lemma gen_upper_bound_decreasing:
  fixes a :: real
  assumes "x \<le> a"
      and "\<And>y. x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> a \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. fu x - f x) has_real_derivative g y) (at y)"
      and "\<And>y. x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> y \<le> a \<Longrightarrow> g y \<le> 0"
      and "fu a = f a"
    shows "f x \<le> fu x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f x \<le> fu x
apply (rule gen_lower_bound_decreasing [of x a _ _  "\<lambda>u. - g u"])

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. x \<le> a
 2. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>x \<le> y; y \<le> a\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. f x - fu x) has_real_derivative
                          - g y)
                          (at y)
 3. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>x \<le> y; y \<le> a\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> 0 \<le> - g y
 4. f a = fu a
using assms DERIV_minus [where f = "\<lambda>x. fu x - f x"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<le> a
  \<lbrakk>x \<le> ?y; ?y \<le> a\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. fu x - f x) has_real_derivative g ?y)
                     (at ?y)
  \<lbrakk>x \<le> ?y; ?y \<le> a\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> g ?y \<le> 0
  fu a = f a
  ((\<lambda>x. fu x - f x) has_real_derivative ?D)
   (at ?x within ?s) \<Longrightarrow>
  ((\<lambda>x. - (fu x - f x)) has_real_derivative - ?D) (at ?x within ?s)

goal (4 subgoals):
 1. x \<le> a
 2. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>x \<le> y; y \<le> a\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> ((\<lambda>x. f x - fu x) has_real_derivative
                          - g y)
                          (at y)
 3. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>x \<le> y; y \<le> a\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> 0 \<le> - g y
 4. f a = fu a
apply auto

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
end
